mapper.select: SELECT u_id, mem_type_id, u_name, u_email, u_nick, u_pw, u_tel, DATE_FORMAT(u_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS u_reg_date, u_marketing, u_gender, DATE_FORMAT(u_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS u_birth, u_google_login, u_naver_login, u_kakao_login, social_type, refresh_token FROM member WHERE u_id = #{uId}

SELECT u_id, mem_type_id, u_name, u_email, u_nick, u_pw, u_tel, DATE_FORMAT(u_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS u_reg_date, u_marketing, u_gender, DATE_FORMAT(u_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS u_birth, u_google_login, u_naver_login, u_kakao_login, social_type, refresh_token FROM member WHERE u_email = #{uEmail}

SELECT u_id, mem_type_id, u_name, u_email, u_nick, u_pw, u_tel, DATE_FORMAT(u_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS u_reg_date, u_marketing, u_gender, DATE_FORMAT(u_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS u_birth, u_google_login, u_naver_login, u_kakao_login, social_type, refresh_token FROM member WHERE refresh_token = #{refreshToken}

SELECT u_id, mem_type_id, u_name, u_email, u_nick, u_pw, u_tel, DATE_FORMAT(u_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS u_reg_date, u_marketing, u_gender, DATE_FORMAT(u_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS u_birth, u_google_login, u_naver_login, u_kakao_login, social_type, refresh_token FROM member WHERE social_type = #{socialType} AND (u_google_login = #{uGoogleLogin} OR u_naver_login = #{uNaverLogin} OR u_kakao_login = #{uKakaoLogin})
